articles.title: Wishes for Stronger Sino-DPRK Friendship Expressed
articles.content:
Wishes for Stronger Sino-DPRK Friendship Expressed
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Dai Bingguo, state councilor of the People's Republic of China, and Yang Jiechi, Chinese foreign minister, separately met and conversed with the delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs led by its Vice-Minister Kim Yong Il on a visit to China in Beijing on Sept. 4.
					 Dai Bingguo referred to the fact that events including the opening ceremony of "the year of China-DPRK friendship" were successfully held.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the Korean people would open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Yang Jiechi said that he was pleased with the fresh successes made by the Korean people in the socialist construction under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Noting that this year marks "the year of China-DPRK friendship" in which falls the 60th anniversary of the establishment of China-DPRK diplomatic relations, he hoped that two countries would continue to preserve the exchange and cooperation in the diplomatic field and the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations would be further boosted.

articles.title: New Documentary Film Produced
articles.content:
New Documentary Film Produced
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- "Glorifying the Revolutionary Traditions", Part 2 of documentary film "The Sun of Songun Shedding Its Rays All over the World", has been produced by the Korean Documentary and Science Film Studio.
					The film extensively and profoundly deals with the historical facts that General Secretary Kim Jong Il has wisely led the work for firmly preserving and glorifying the Songun revolutionary traditions of Juche.
					
					 It shows vivid scenes telling that Kim Jong Il authored many works on the revolutionary traditions after exploring the way for the study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu in the middle of the 1950s and initiated the projects for turning the Wangjaesan Revolutionary Site and the Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site into eternal treasures of the Korean revolution and wisely led them.
					
					The film impressively tells stories that Kim Jong Il made sure that the education in the revolutionary traditions was energetically conducted through the "1000-ri Journey for Learning", the " 1,000-ri Journey for National Liberation" and the study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu and the whole society was pervaded with the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu under the slogan "Let us produce, study and live like anti-Japanese guerrillas!" and showed warm loving care and trust for the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters.
					
					 It contains scenes showing the area of Lake Samji turned into a centre for the education in the revolutionary traditions, a holy land of revolution, thanks to the tireless efforts of the peerlessly great man in the new century, too.
					
					 The tradition of Juche will last forever and the DPRK always remain prosperous thanks to Kim Jong Il, stresses the film.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" made public on September 5 last year is a highly important work to be held fast to in successfully carrying forward the Juche-oriented cause of the socialist nation-building started by President Kim Il Sung, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il in his work reviewed with pride the 60-year-long history of the DPRK, the most glorious road of victory covered under guidance of the great leader and the great party. He in the work clarified the popular and independent character of the DPRK, which has embodied the Juche idea in the state construction and activities, and its tremendous might and comprehensively indicated tasks and ways for vigorously pushing forward the drive to build a thriving nation. 
					
					 The publication of the work provided the Korean people with a powerful ideological and theoretical weapon for making the DPRK shine as eternal Kim Il Sung's Korea and a thriving socialist nation of Juche for all ages. 
					
					 The work serves as great inspiring banner imbuing all the people with high national pride and honor of living in the dignified invincible socialist country and important guidelines as it gives perfect answers to all the theoretical and practical questions arising in building a thriving socialist nation, the article notes, and continues:
					
					 The work is immensely exciting the Korean people, displaying such tremendous vitality as the theses that clearly indicated the general orientation and strategy for the state development in the new era of the Juche revolution, Songun era.
					
					 It is thanks to this powerful ideological and theoretical treasured sword that the Korean people are confidently pushing forward the building of a thriving nation and bringing about uninterrupted eye-opening miracles and changes that startle the era through the high-pitched drive for effecting a new great revolutionary surge despite the prevailing tense situation, concludes the article.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Opt for Improving Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Opt for Improving Inter-Korean Relations
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration called a press conference in Seoul on Sept. 4 to denounce the south Korean authorities for laying hurdles in the way of exchange with the north.
					 The committee referred to the fact that on Sept. 3 the "Ministry of Unification" selectively struck out Jong Tae Yon, co-executive chairman of the south side committee from the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea, and four others on the list of members of the south side delegation for working-level contact between the north and south side committees scheduled to take place in China.
					
					 It deplored that the regime took the above-said action against the south side committee grouping south Koreans of various social standings in the wake of disallowing the working-contact of its affiliated scientific, youth and students and peasants headquarters with the north in July, thus persistently blocking social and cultural exchange.
					
					 This action is little short of chilling the atmosphere of the recent moves to make a switchover in the inter-Korean relations, it said, demanding the authorities lift at once the action of restricting the activities of non-governmental organizations for no reason.
					
					 The organization earnestly urged the authorities to opt for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 At the end of the conference, the organization submitted a written protest to the "Ministry of Unification".
					
					 On Sept. 3 the committee held an emergency meeting for measures and expressed indignation at the authorities' unilateral decision devoid of any standards or objectivity. It stated it cannot but remain skeptical about how they intend to handle the inter-Korean issue.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Celebrated by Koreans in China
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Celebrated by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the General Association of Koreans in China was held in Shenyang on Sept. 2 to celebrate the 61st founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Yang Yong Dong, chairman of the association, in a report said that the founding of the DPRK enabled the people in the homeland to emerge a mighty and dignified people carving out their destiny in an independent and creative manner with a firm hold on it as the true master of the state and society for the first time in history.
					
					He noted that the plan of President Kim Il Sung to build a rich and powerful country has been successfully carried forward and brought into full bloom thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He called on all Koreans in China to turn out as one in the sacred struggle to accomplish the historic cause of national reunification under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Observed in Various Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Observed in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in South Africa and opening ceremonies of Korean book, photo and art exhibition in Italy and Indonesia between August 27 and 29 on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					Displayed in the venues of exhibitions were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and photos on exploits of the peerlessly great persons performed in founding, strengthening and developing the DPRK and books, pictures and art works on the wisdom and talents of the Korean people and their successes in their efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					  David Mahobo, chairman of the Mahlambandlophy, Pretoria City, Branch of the African National Congress of South Africa, said that the founding of the DPRK marked an event of national historic significance as it brought freedom and cradle of happiness to the Korean people. The Korean people could reach the highest level of glory and dynamically advance towards a hope-filled future thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, he added.
					
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party who is chairman of the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People, said that Kim Jong Il has successfully realized the desire of the President to build a thriving nation with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 The chairman of the Italy-Korea Cultural Association noted that under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the Korean people have registered big successes in their struggle to build socialism and reunify the country while smashing the moves of the hostile forces including the U.S. to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Observed in Colombia
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Observed in Colombia
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia issued bulletin entitled "Invulnerable Fortress of Socialism" on August 31 on the occasion of the 61st birthday of the DPRK.
					 The bulletin in an article cited facts to prove that the DPRK, founded on September 9, 1948, has demonstrated to the world its might as an invulnerable fortress of socialism as it has a transparent guiding idea, tremendous national power and rock-firm mass foundation.
					
					 Since its founding the DPRK has dynamically pushed forward the socialist cause, guided by the Juche idea, Songun idea propounded by President Kim Il Sung who is father of nation building, the bulletin noted, and continued:
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun politics as the main political mode under socialism as required by the prevailing situation and fully applied it to all fields, thus making it possible for socialist Korea to firmly protect its sovereignty and dignity.
					
					 The bulletin recalled that political forces in the society of the DPRK have grown strong remarkably and it successfully launched satellite Kwangmyongsong-2, consolidating its position as a satellite launcher, and built by dint of tremendous military power reliable war deterrent which no formidable enemy dares provoke.
					
					 The DPRK government is absolutely trusted and supported by the people, it stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Czech Republic
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in booklet by the Futra Publishing House in the Czech Republic.
					 The work, published on Sept. 5, Juche 97 (2008), clarifies the idea that the 60-year long history of the DPRK is a history of great struggle and victory and that of great creation and change during which the Korean people defended the independence and honor of the country and built a socialist country, rich and powerful and prosperous, despite the tempest of the revolution under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and the great party and that a country, though small and backward, can become a developed, dignified and strong country when it has a great leader and great party.
					
					 The work also indicates tasks and ways for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, holding high the banner of the Juche idea, the banner of Songun. 
					
					 A book releasing ceremony was held at the publishing house on September 1.
